Honolulu on sale with Air New Zealand - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Honolulu on sale with Air New Zealand Hang out at Hawaii’s most beautiful beaches or climb to the top of dormant volcanoes. Discover the glimmering ocean, emerald valleys and moonlight evenings. From hidden sea caves along the coast to state parks that let you walk in the footsteps of Hawaiian royalty, immerse yourself in the island culture and history. Deal Details Travel Dates 1 Feb 2026 - 5 Mar 2026 Sale Ends Nov 14, 2025 Priced From $2,435 Enquire Now Hang out at Hawaii’s most beautiful beaches or climb to the top of dormant volcanoes. Discover the glimmering ocean, emerald valleys and moonlight evenings. From hidden sea caves along the coast to state parks that let you walk in the footsteps of Hawaiian royalty, immerse yourself in the island culture and history. Accommodation Outrigger Waikiki Paradise Hotel (4 stars) This property has been reimagined with a blend of modern design and deep cultural heritage. Located just steps from Waikiki Beach and next door to International Market Place, enjoy state-of-the-art facilities and two unique on-property dining experiences. Rooms Waikiki View Room (7 nights) 08 Feb - 05 Mar 26 Stay price: $2,435.00 Bonus: Waived Resort Fee Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Honolulu from Auckland 7 nights accommodation Bonuses as specified Note: Package price is per person, double share Mandatory resort fees are additional and payable direct, as specified Hilton Waikiki Beach Resort & Spa (4 stars) Discover plenty of ways to relax and enjoy beautiful Waikiki at the conveniently located Hilton Waikiki Beach Resort & Spa. Savour dining option at the restaurant open 24/7, relax in the complimentary poolside cabanas or head to the beach only a block away. Admire city, mountain or ocean views from each rooms private balcony and enjoy a spacious room or suite at the Hilton, perfect for couples, families, and business guests. Rooms City View Room (7 nights) 01 Feb - 05 Mar 26 Stay price: $2,629.00 Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Honolulu from Auckland 7 nights accommodation Bonuses as specified Note: Package price is per person, double share Mandatory resort fees are additional and payable direct, as specified Queen Kapiolani Hotel (4 stars) Named for Hawaii’s beloved Queen Kapiolani, this hotel is ideally located 1 block from Waikiki Beach, near the foot of the majestic Diamond Head. The Honolulu Zoo and Waikiki Aquarium are adjacent to the hotel. Shopping, dining and plenty of entertainment venues are all within walking distance; making this hotel perfect for a family holiday or romantic getaway. Relax by the 3rd-floor swimming pool, grab a drink at The Deck Pool Bar or just sit back and take in the spectacular panoramic Diamond Head view. Rooms Ocean View Studio (7 nights) 01 Feb - 05 Mar 26 Stay price: $2,639.00 Features Return Economy Class Airfares flying Air New Zealand to Honolulu from Auckland 7 nights accommodation Bonuses as specified Note: Package price is per person, double share Mandatory resort fees are additional and payable direct, as specified Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 21 October 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 20 October 2025 until 14 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Fare Basis: For travel: 01 Feb 26 - 05 Mar 26 - GSLHNL72 ('G' Class). General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares are based on economy class. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply.Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs.Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
